description: A touchdown-worthy fit, paired with spectator-level comfort— the Letterman men's casual sock is knit to their athletic performance specs, using high-loft, ultra-supple, twisted yarn. Making a big play or just kicking back, you can count on a light, soft feel minus any slippage or slop.
name: Darn Tough Socks Letterman Crew Lightweight Cushion Socks - Mens
